Title: Relates to requiring annual inspections for any increase in rent due to a major capital improvement
Summary: Requires annual inspections for any increase in rent due to a major capital improvement.
LawCode: Amd §§26-511.1 & 26-405.1, NYC Ad Cd; amd §10-b, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974; amd §8-a, Emerg Hous Rent Cont L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four and the emergency housing rent control law, in relation to requiring annual inspections for any increase in rent due to a major capital improvement
